title: 20. Waiter, There’s a Physicist in My Soup! (Part 2)
description: What do a computer hacker, an Indiana farm boy, and Napoleon Bonaparte have in common? The past, present, and future of food science.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
